subject: Shipping Issue – ALS01196289964
description_text:
Hello,

My tracking number ALS01196289964 shows “Nancheng, Verification failed” and
no updates since 2025-09-26.

Korean customs also has no record.

If shipped on order date, it should already be in Korea.

Korean Thanksgiving holidays begins soon, so urgent resolution is needed.

Please tell me the problem and request any info you need from me.

Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi 이광희,    The logistics company has closed for the day. We will confirm your order first thing tomorrow morning. Please don't worry—we'll deliver it to you as soon as possible.

Ok, thank you so much.

2025년 9월 29일 (월) 19:49, service@simsonn.com
